outline:
1. to bind, tie, bind together, league together, conspire
    1. (Qal)
      1. to bind, confine
      2. to league together, conspire
    2. (Niphal) to be bound, be bound up
    3. (Piel)
      1. to bind on
      2. to bind fast
      3. to bind, tie
      4. to bind to oneself
    4. (Pual) robust, vigorous (participle)
    5. (Hithpael) to conspire
kjv_def: bind (up), (make a) conspire(-acy, -ator), join together, knit, stronger, work (treason).
strongs_def: to tie, physically (gird, confine, compact) or mentally (in love, league)
